description: Tried to get this to work for 30 minutes with my ipad and I just couldn't. Had the app on my ipad, same network. I followed the instructions on the app and still couldn't get it to work. The devices couldn't find/see each other to pair. Overall negative experience. When I couldn't get it to connect, it was a complete road block. Back to the drawing board to find something to help me connect my ipad to my pc.
Simple, easy to understand and does what it should.
summary: Works like a charm between my Ubuntu Desktop and my android tablet

description: Why include this in the standard download???
Love the functionality and would like error messages log in GUI!
It disconnects often, but when it is working it's amazing!
Better and easier to use than Microsoft Phonelink or Google share.

It is the best app and I regularly use it on other distros. However, when I use KDE Neon it never search or pair new devices, I think someting is broken. GSconnect and KDE Connect is the best option controlling and checking your phone while you use PC. transferring files or folders, ringing your phone when you can not find it, getting all notifications including your device status over your PC are the great benefits. I hope KDE Neon can solve the issue as soon as possible.
This app is a bless and the most convenient phone-to-computer interface I've ever encountered
Thanks for this great app. But if it possible to transfer directories between devices it be can user friendlier.

Great, now how can I get to work?
Do I have to have a computer degree?
Straight up does not work
This works great with all my Android devices.

It is working very fine as always with my Android phone, however, the connections between my laptop and my desktop is failing (it was working fine before). What's failing between my Desktop and Laptop?
File transfers. It stays sending files forever.
They are not pairing automatically.
The connection is lost and the device is not trusted, even after to click refresh button.

I have read that this issues were solved in Kde Connect versions for 20.10 (and other non lts versions). It would be nice having an update of the LTS version with the fixes too. (If I could only help on this kind of things, be sure I will help but I am missing the knowledge :( ).
summary: The only piece that is missing to my Kubuntu 20.04 to be perfect

description: I got rid of it as some point because I did not really use it. As I recall it cleaned out my phone of pictures which I really didn't want. But CSConnect looked promising so I reinstalled KDE and nothing works. I can send Bluetooth from my laptop to my phone but KDE does not detect any devices. Oh well.
summary: Used it a year ago right out of the box, this time, nothing

description: Unreliable, for sure. Not really practical if I have to go chasing troubleshooting ideas down online when I just want to send an MP3 to my phone....any WORKING alternatives out there?
summary: Worked great the first time. Hasn't worked since

description: Doesn't work, statistically not verified for clients. Need improvement!

I had to switch from ZorinOS to Ubuntu and I loved Zorin Connect. Zorin Connect looks like a derivative of KDE just as Zorin OS is based on Ubuntu, but Zorin Connect works without issue. KDE barely ever connects, it cross threads messages. I really miss Zorin OS.

I used to this a lot. But sometime doesn't connect automaticly just after I refresh a few time manually. 
Another bug. When I first used the remote mouse on the mobile work as fine. Now it have a problem on a second monitor. On the notebook monitor still work fine, but if I enter the second one just stuck on right and can't use on.

I get notifications on my phone and pc. It lets me transfer files back and forth. 

Super useful, it lets me copy things back and forth using clipboard. As in text, which is a real time saver. 

Lets me see and send text messages on my computer. 

Works to use my phone as a mouse to control my computer. 

Is it perfect? No by all means it has a couple little issues here and there. But Id be unhappy living my life without it! 

Grab it and make your life a little easier!
could not see my device.
Recently switched to Kubuntu and this is icing on the cake. No more checking my phone to know I can safely ignore whatever just made it buzz!
cant see device
it dose everything it says it dose, not much to complain about here.
Worked fine few updates ago, but now browsing files on phone fails with sshfs exit code 1. Judging by google search, it seems like the developers keep stepping on the same rake over and over again.
this error started after update 5.27 before it was working finne it may have happened due to incompatible mismatched updates of kde neon and ubuntu base

Makes life easy. Is reliable. 
One should never say 'perfect', but for me this app comes close it.

just doesn't work.
Whether you turn firewall on or off, kde doesn't work.

It immediately crashed upon first launch. Totally not ready for prime time. I've only been using this Ubuntu 22.04 LTS ARM 64 device for a week, so it's not like I've installed a bunch of conflicting stuff. All I put on here was NoMachine.
summary: It immediately crashed upon first launch

description: Though user experience on different distributions vary greatly. I'm running KDE Neon 5.27 and use KDE Connect with my smartphone, browser and OS. Easy to copy files, clipboard and multimedia controls and more. I'm very happy with it.
5/5 10/10.....people are so rediculous

I find the app very useful. However, the app should clearly warn users to open specific ports both on TCP and UDP, i.e. 1714:1764

Because there are users who dare to use a firewall!
Couldn't get it to work on S20FE + Ubuntu 23.04 and previous, fresh OS install and new phone and now it works like a dream
summary: Works perfectly on Ubuntu 23.10 and Galaxy S22

description:
At first it can be a bit tricky to set up but when you are done with it it is great. 
In my Opinion better as the option on windows with Microsoft connect.

Using it at the moment with a Sony Smartphone (Android 13) and Ubuntu.
It's a pretty amazing application, especially if it's well up to date on all devices it's installed upon. It helps me manage my workspace by letting all my devices operate in sync.
It's been very useful to me.

KDEConnect is a killer app that's being slept on.

Just install the app on your phone, then if you're on GNOME install the GSConnect extension, or if you're on KDE install KDE Connect (this).

Unfortunately, because Apple hates freedom and won't allow any free software applications on their devices, you can't use this with an iPhone. But that's Apple's fault, buy an Android device (or another Linux-based device with an open ecosystem).
summary: Been using it for years, love it

description: Incredibly useful to quickly and easily let me transfer files across devices.❤️‍🔥

Want to connect my Android phone to my Ethernet only Ubuntu PC. 
After successfully getting KDEConnect on the phone via Google Play, first I tried GSConnect, which I couldn't even find on the PC although it was supposed to be installed. So took a long shot and installed this on the PC although I don't have the KDE desktop. Seems to work in a rudimentary way. Have beenable to move some files.
summary: Seems to work on my Gnome desktop

description: In beginning it worked quiet well for a few days. But now for no reason at all KDE-Connect doens't start anymore!
KDE-Connect ist perfekt dafür geeignet, um Dateien zwischen Handy und Computer auszutauschen, die Zwischenablage zu teilen und vielem mehr. Mit meinem Google Pixel 5 funktioniert alles einwandfrei.
summary: Sehr gut funktionierende Synchronisation mit Android

description: Leider immer Verbindungsabbrüche und Dateien zu transferieren klappt aktuell mit Iphone nicht.

Ich bin kein Strahlen-Freund.
Daher muss eine Verbindung bei mir über Netzwerk oder USB möglich sein. Ein Handy über USB am PC angeschlossen hat per se eine Verbindung. Warum das dann nicht geht, ist mir unbegreiflich.

funktioniert auf keinem Verbindunsweg (wlan, usb...) mit einem Samsung galaxy Handy gut. Kde Con. lobt sich zwar selbst, ist aber absoluter Mist. Ich kann in den internen Speicher des Handys sehen, kann aber nicht auf Fotos zugreifen.
Auch hier ist die Frage nach dem Sinn dieses Programms.

Es una pena que para una tableta no te muestre el escritorio de Ubuntu (o no he sabido como), eso sería atómico, pero el envío de ficheros va fenomenal y puedes manejar aplicaciones multimedia como Clementine desde la tableta
ta potenteeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
I'm using ubuntu 20.04 and I cannot send files to my android phone. Both devices are connected, phone can send files to the laptop but not in the other way.

resulta que se puede pero tienes que dar click en el icono de kde y despues sen file

en el celular debes indicar la carpeta de transferencia

Por alguna razon en Ubuntu 22.04 no se sincroiza el portapeles entre los dispositivos ni me deja usar la entrada remota para controlar la computadora desde el celular. Las otras funciones me responden bien pero esas dos son muy utiles y seria bueno que funcionaran bien.
summary: No se sincroniza el portapeles ni la entrada remota

description: conecta ubuntu con iphone rápido, sencillo y los archivos se envían a la velocidad de la luz.

Desde la última actualización no puedo navegar en mi móvil Xaomi lo que hace más pesado pasar archivos del ordenador al movil y viceversa no se puede manejar las carpetas y los archiivos del móvil en el ordenador.
Se ha perdido mucha utilidad por eso solo le pongo 3 estrellas
summary: Ya no se puede navegar en mi dispositivo

description:
Application intéressante mais au fonctionnement malheureusement aléatoire.
Je ne m'étendrai pas sur la fonctionnalité de SMS, qui semble condamnée à ne jamais marcher, mais plutôt sur KDE Connect lui-même, qui refuse de démarrer sur PC, que ce soit KDE Connect ou l'indicateur. 
Quand l'application fonctionne (ça arrive), rien à dire. Mais de façon aléatoire, elle ne démarre pas ...
je recommande fortement

Les fonctionnalités sont alléchantes en théorie, mais n'ont jamais fonctionnées correctement dans mon cas de figure (et sur plusieurs essais).
Dommage.
je ne recommande pas du tout
полезное приложение,лично мне очень нравится и я с удавольствием им пользуюсь и советую друзьям!

https://ibb.co/BtcvFY4
https://ibb.co/bH0FRfL
https://ibb.co/x56cZG4
summary: глухой не слышит, слепой не ищет

description: rrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr32t2t2 qt2
Очен нужная и удобная программа для передачи файлов.
Программа , к сожалению, умеет только запускаться и всё,исправьте пожалуйста.
Шикарный софт для связи с телефоном, работает как заявлено, и, в отличие от аналогичного софта под Винду, не требует левых аккаунтов. Песня!
Почему? потому что реально штука полезная но засоряет сиситему
Устройства в одной сети не видят друг-друга. Бесполезное приложение
对原生的安卓支持较好，然而因为安卓的国产魔改限制太多，反而造成的BUG很多
summary: 对安卓原生优化比较好
